      • addContact

        public void addContact(Context context,
              CNUser user,
              java.lang.String contactName,
              AddContactCallback callback)
        Add a contact with the given Cashew username.
        Parameters:
        context - Calling context. Can be an application context.
        user - The currently logged in user.
        contactName - The Cashew ID of the contact to add.
        callback - Listener to receive results of the call.

      • getFriendSuggestions

        public void getFriendSuggestions(Context context,
                        CNUser user,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> phoneNumbers,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> emailAddresses,
                        FriendSuggestionsCallback callback)
        Get a list of friend recommendations based on known email addresses and phone numbers.
        Parameters:
        context - Calling context. Can be an application context.
        user - The currently logged in user.
        phoneNumbers - List of phone numbers used to generate suggestions.
        emailAddresses - List of email addresses used to generate suggestions.
        callback - Listener to receive results of the call.

      • respondToFriendRequest

        public void respondToFriendRequest(Context context,
                          CNIncomingFriend friend,
                          RespondToFriendRequestCallback callback,
                          boolean accept)
        Send a friend request to the user.
        Parameters:
        context - Calling context. Can be an application context.
        friend - A friend request.
        callback - Listener to receive results of the call.
        accept - whether to accept or reject the request. true to accept, false to reject.

        Parameters:
        context - Calling context. Can be an application context.
        friend - A friend suggestion.
        callback - Listener to receive results of the call.
